content.question: The changes in Russia described in the second paragraph most directly resulted in which of the following?

choices.label: Expansion of urban centers in Russia
Population growth and declining infant mortality in rural areas
Legislation designed to restrict working hours for industrial laborers
The persistence of serfdom and the dominance of landowning elites

content.answer: Expansion of urban centers in Russia

topic.text: 6.3: Second Wave Industrialization and Its Effects

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
